item.title: Lisbon Funicular Crash: What to Know About Cause and Victims
item.description: At least 16 people were killed after the Glória funicular, one of the city’s most popular tourist attractions, crashed.

item.title: Portugal Searches for Cause of Lisbon Funicular Crash as Death Toll Rises
item.description: The authorities were also working to identify the victims, which a local official said included some foreigners. The funicular is popular with tourist...

item.title: Giorgio Armani, Italian Fashion Designer, Dies at 91
item.description: He created a male uniform whose feminized form won favor with women. An alliance with movie stars made his name all but synonymous with red-carpet dre...

item.title: Whistle-Blower Complaints Detail Tension Over Vaccines at N.I.H.
item.description: Two former agency leaders said the administration’s “hostility” toward vaccines had spread to the agency’s top ranks.

item.title: Giorgio Armani’s Life in Photos
item.description: One of the most prolific fashion designers in history, he turned a certain kind of Italian chic into an international phenomenon.
